title: Contact Us
description: Have a question or need assistance? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

description.label: Message
description.placeholder: Please describe your inquiry in detail (minimum 20 characters)...

success.title: Message Sent Successfully
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Failed to Send Message
error.message: Something went wrong while sending your message. Please try again.
